title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What product does Joey advertise in the info-mercial?
options: The Juice Master 2000
The Milk Master 2000
The Carton Opener 2000
The Bottle Buddy 2000
questions.correct_answer: The Milk Master 2000
questions.explanation: Joey is in an info-mercial for the Milk Master 2000, a product that helps open milk cartons easily.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: Why did Phoebe take the blame for Joey missing his audition?
options: Because she was Joey's agent
Because she forgot to give Joey the message
Because she was trying to help Joey get more auditions
Because she wanted to be a part of the acting business
questions.correct_answer: Because she forgot to give Joey the message
questions.explanation: Phoebe took the blame because she was the one who forgot to give Joey the message about his audition.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the name of the doll that Ben is attached to?
options: G.I. Joe
Barbi
Ken
Action Man
questions.correct_answer: Barbi
questions.explanation: Ben is attached to a Barbi doll, which he chose himself from the toy store.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: Why did Chandler give Janice a drawer?
options: Because she needed a place to store her clothes
Because he wanted to show his commitment to their relationship
Because she asked him for one
Because he was trying to get rid of his old dresser
questions.correct_answer: Because he wanted to show his commitment to their relationship
questions.explanation: Chandler gave Janice a drawer as a symbol of his commitment to their relationship, showing that she has a place in his life.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What advice do Rachel and Monica give Chandler about how to deal with Janice?
options: To be more clingy and needy
To be more aloof and distant
To be more romantic and affectionate
To be more honest and open
questions.correct_answer: To be more aloof and distant
questions.explanation: Rachel and Monica advise Chandler to act aloof and distant in order to deal with Janice and not come on too strong.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the name of the accent that Joey tries to use when he says 'I canna work on a new accent'?
options: Italian
Spanish
French
German
questions.correct_answer: Italian
questions.explanation: Joey tries to use an Italian accent when he says 'I canna work on a new accent'.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: Why did Phoebe pretend to be Joey's agent?
options: Because she wanted to help Joey get more auditions
Because she wanted to be a part of the acting business
Because she wanted to spend more time with Joey
Because Joey asked her to
questions.correct_answer: Because Joey asked her to
questions.explanation: Phoebe pretended to be Joey's agent because Joey asked her to, after his real agent Estelle was unable to get him an audition.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's British accent when he runs into Janice at the grocery store?
options: He is trying to impress her
He is trying to hide his identity
He is trying to be funny
He is trying to sound more sophisticated
questions.correct_answer: He is trying to sound more sophisticated
questions.explanation: Chandler uses a British accent when he runs into Janice at the grocery store, likely in an attempt to sound more sophisticated and impress her.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the outcome of Chandler's conversation with Janice after he pretends to be British?
options: She is impressed and agrees to go out with him again
She is confused and walks away
She is angry and tells him to leave her alone
She is amused and teases him about his accent
questions.correct_answer: She is angry and tells him to leave her alone
questions.explanation: Janice is not impressed with Chandler's British accent and becomes angry, telling him to leave her alone.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the advice that Rachel and Monica give Chandler when Janice calls him?
options: To be honest and open with her
To be more romantic and affectionate
To pretend to be asleep and grumpy
To tell her that he is not interested
questions.correct_answer: To pretend to be asleep and grumpy
questions.explanation: Rachel and Monica advise Chandler to pretend to be asleep and grumpy when Janice calls him, in order to throw her off and regain the upper hand in their relationship.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the outcome of Chandler's conversation with Janice after he pretends to be asleep and grumpy?
options: She is angry and hangs up on him
She is confused and asks him what is wrong
She is amused and teases him about his behavior
She forgives him and they make up
questions.correct_answer: She forgives him and they make up
questions.explanation: Janice forgives Chandler and they make up, with Chandler apologizing for his behavior and Janice accepting his apology.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What toy does Ross try to get Ben to play with instead of the Barbi doll?
options: G.I. Joe
Action Man
Teddy bear
Lego
questions.correct_answer: G.I. Joe
questions.explanation: Ross tries to get Ben to play with G.I. Joe instead of the Barbi doll.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: Why does Ross want Ben to play with G.I. Joe instead of the Barbi doll?
options: Because G.I. Joe is more masculine
Because the Barbi doll is too feminine
Because G.I. Joe is more educational
Because the Barbi doll is too expensive
questions.correct_answer: Because G.I. Joe is more masculine
questions.explanation: Ross wants Ben to play with G.I. Joe instead of the Barbi doll because he thinks G.I. Joe is a more masculine toy.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the reaction of Carol and Susan when they find out that Ben is playing with a Barbi doll?
options: They are shocked and disappointed
They are amused and think it is cute
They are concerned that Ben is too feminine
They are angry and blame Ross
questions.correct_answer: They are amused and think it is cute
questions.explanation: Carol and Susan are amused and think it is cute that Ben is playing with a Barbi doll.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: Why does Phoebe pretend to be a agent on the phone?
options: To help Joey get more auditions
To get a job as an agent
To impress her friends
To practice her acting skills
questions.correct_answer: To help Joey get more auditions
questions.explanation: Phoebe pretends to be an agent on the phone in order to help Joey get more auditions.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the result of Phoebe's phone call to the casting director?
options: Joey gets the audition
Joey doesn't get the audition
The casting director hangs up on Phoebe
The casting director asks Phoebe to audition
questions.correct_answer: Joey gets the audition
questions.explanation: As a result of Phoebe's phone call to the casting director, Joey gets the audition.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: Why does Joey want Phoebe to continue pretending to be his agent?
options: Because she is a good agent
Because he likes her company
Because he wants to help her practice her acting skills
Because he doesn't want to go back to his old agent
questions.correct_answer: Because she is a good agent
questions.explanation: Joey wants Phoebe to continue pretending to be his agent because she is actually good at it and helps him get auditions.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's fear of commitment?
options: He is afraid of losing his freedom
He is afraid of getting hurt
He is afraid of being tied down
He is afraid of not being able to have fun
questions.correct_answer: He is afraid of losing his freedom
questions.explanation: Chandler's fear of commitment is rooted in his fear of losing his freedom and being tied down in a relationship.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the advice that Joey gives Chandler about how to deal with his fear of commitment?
options: To face his fear head-on
To run away from his fear
To pretend that he is not afraid
To seek therapy
questions.correct_answer: To face his fear head-on
questions.explanation: Joey advises Chandler to face his fear of commitment head-on and to be the most committed guy there is.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the outcome of Chandler's attempt to face his fear of commitment?
options: He is successful and overcomes his fear
He is unsuccessful and his fear worsens
He becomes more confident in his relationship
He becomes more unsure of his relationship
questions.correct_answer: He becomes more unsure of his relationship
questions.explanation: Chandler's attempt to face his fear of commitment leads to him becoming more unsure of his relationship with Janice.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the reason for Janice's initial reaction to Chandler's attempt to face his fear of commitment?
options: She is touched by his effort
She is amused by his awkwardness
She is annoyed by his sudden change
She is scared by his intensity
questions.correct_answer: She is annoyed by his sudden change
questions.explanation: Janice is initially annoyed by Chandler's sudden change and his attempt to face his fear of commitment, which comes across as insincere and overwhelming.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the outcome of Phoebe's decision to pretend to be Joey's agent?
options: Joey gets more auditions
Joey becomes more confident
Phoebe becomes a successful agent
Joey fires his old agent
questions.correct_answer: Joey gets more auditions
questions.explanation: As a result of Phoebe's decision to pretend to be Joey's agent, Joey gets more auditions.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's initial reaction to Ben's attachment to the Barbi doll?
options: He is concerned about Ben's masculinity
He is amused by Ben's choice
He is annoyed by Ben's stubbornness
He is touched by Ben's sensitivity
questions.correct_answer: He is concerned about Ben's masculinity
questions.explanation: Ross is initially concerned about Ben's masculinity because Ben is attached to a Barbi doll, which Ross perceives as a feminine toy.

topic.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross's attempt to get Ben to play with G.I. Joe instead of the Barbi doll?
options: Ben starts playing with G.I. Joe
Ben refuses to play with G.I. Joe
Ben becomes more attached to the Barbi doll
Ben starts playing with both toys
questions.correct_answer: Ben refuses to play with G.I. Joe
questions.explanation: Ross's attempt to get Ben to play with G.I. Joe instead of the Barbi doll is unsuccessful, and Ben continues to prefer the Barbi doll.
